mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CARE_ID) FROM CAREER WHERE CARE_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{datePrefix}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAREER (CARE_ID, CARE_ACCOUNT_ID, CARE_NAME, CARE_CONTACT, CARE_SOSOK, CARE_POSITION, CARE_PERIOD, CARE_JOB, CARE_ISSUER, CARE_ISSUER_CONTACT, CARE_DATE, CARE_COMPANY, CARE_STATUS) VALUES (#{careId}, #{careAccountId}, #{careName}, #{careContact}, #{careSosok}, #{carePosition}, #{carePeriod}, #{careJob}, #{careIssuer}, #{careIssuerContact}, #{careDate}, #{careCompany},'N')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAREER c WHERE CARE_STATUS != 'D' AND CARE_STATUS != 'B'

SELECT CARE_ID, CARE_ACCOUNT_ID, CARE_NAME, CARE_CONTACT, CARE_SOSOK, CARE_POSITION, CARE_PERIOD, CARE_JOB, CARE_ISSUER, CARE_ISSUER_CONTACT, CARE_DATE, CARE_STATUS, CARE_STATUS_DATE, CARE_REASON, CARE_COMPANY FROM (SELECT CARE_ID, CARE_ACCOUNT_ID, CARE_NAME, CARE_CONTACT, CARE_SOSOK, CARE_POSITION, CARE_PERIOD, CARE_JOB, CARE_ISSUER, CARE_ISSUER_CONTACT, CARE_DATE, CARE_STATUS, CARE_STATUS_DATE, CARE_REASON, CARE_COMPANY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CARE_DATE DESC, CARE_ID DESC) AS RN FROM CAREER c WHERE CARE_STATUS != 'D' AND CARE_STATUS != 'B') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAREER SET CARE_STATUS = 'S', CARE_STATUS_DATE = CURRENT_DATE WHERE CARE_ID=#{careId}
UPDATE INSTR_PROFILE SET INPR_CERT = 'S' WHERE INPR_ACCOUNT_ID = #{userAccountId}
